```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
library(ggplot2)
library(rsurvstat)
```

Get some RSV data:

```{r}
tmp = rsurvstat::get_timeseries(rsurvstat::diseases$`COVID-19`, "Count")
```

Re-band age groups and plot

```{r}

tmp2 = tmp %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(date)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(ageCat = dplyr::case_when(
     is.na(age) ~ "Unknown",
     age < 18 ~ "<18",
     age < 35 ~ "18-34",
     age < 65 ~ "35-64",
     TRUE ~ "65+",
  )) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(dplyr::across(c(-age,-count))) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(count = sum(count))


ggplot(tmp2, aes(x=date, y=count)) + geom_line() + facet_wrap(~ageCat)
  
```
